Name: Nupur S
Title: Fashion place
Review: Fashion is the right word for this place. Lots of latest collection is special feature of this place.

Name: garhwaliya
Title: Major brands available
Review: Good to buy major brands products which are having discount and reasonable price with high quality stuff.

Name: Dhyan Chand
Title: Wave Cinama
Review: A place for shopping, eating and watching movies. Here is McDonalds, Vodafone Store, lot if usable shops and Wave Cinama. This place also known as Wave.

Name: Anurag243
Title: Satisfactory
Review: The mall is big and well keep up .. there are lots of options for all ages people visiting here frequently.. at the end a good and satisfactory one..

Name: Gurumurthy Bhargava
Title: An evening in Mall....
Review: East End Mall is one of the oldest mall of Lucknow which is frequented by all age groups. Had the opportunity to visit with  my son as he wanted to buy a new mobile which we could buy from the authorised Samsung Dealer located in the ground floor near the Barista outlet .At Barista  had Cappuccino which was refreshing . This mall also boasts of Vodafone store in addition to most of the branded stores. Wave cinemas is an another attraction.Food court on the top floor is relatively small but okay.McDonald and Pizza Hut outlet  at the ground floor makes for the food court. Parking facilities are good.Overall a nice mall to hang around.

Name: Cyclivist
Title: Nice mall to hangout in the hot sun
Review: The weather in the Lucknow is extremely harsh in the afternoon. I went to this mall as I was bored to sit in hotel.It's a nice well maintained mall having a cinema hall too. As it was extremely hot, I spent some time by watching a movie there. It was a nice experience

Name: sid54321
Title: Good place to hangout in lucknow
Review: This comparatively lavish mall in Lucknow small but have all very big brands. one can enjoy movies at wave cinemas inside mall after /before shopping.

Name: vsrinet
Title: An Experience to Remember
Review: This is the oldest Mall in Lucknow and also the most well managed.Centrally situated,very well connected and has all facilities under one roof.Many international brands,and other reputed iconic showrooms are located here.It is a good place to come and spend a few hours,chilling out with family and friends.Some halls here have GOLD CLASS,which is sheer luxury in movie experience.Our favorites for dining are the Pizza Hut and MacDonald on the ground floor.A very safe place they have their own in house security.

Name: kartik9670
Title: Place for food,shopping,movies and also a bar.
Review: If you are in gomtinagar or Indiranagar must visit place.*MacDonald restaurant*wave cinema*go banana club for partying

Name: Bharat1702
Title: Nice place to be
Review: Had nearly everything inside it. Food court, big brands, everything. Nice place to kill time. Enjoy movie
